text:
There is hereby established a fund to be known as "Smart Start for San Francisco Kids Fund," which shall contain all appropriations for the implementation of this ordinance. This fund shall be a Category 8 fund, meaning that funds shall automatically be appropriated, interest shall accumulate and that any fund balance shall carry forward from year to year. The fund shall contain all monies appropriated from any lawful source for this purpose pursuant to 
Article IX of the City Charter, except that no funds provided by the Children's Fund (Charter Section 
16.108(c)) may be used in the "Smart Start for San Francisco Kids Fund." 
(Added by Proposition I, 11/4/2003)

heading.catch_text: SMART START FOR SAN FRANCISCO KIDS FUND.
